title: U.S. tart cherry production 2018 , by state
summary: The graph shows three State of cherry in U.S. , as a million of incidence .
The most common State is Utah , identified as causing 201.0 million , with Wisconsin of second at 35 million .
Michigan is third , causing 10.9 million of State .
gold: This statistic highlights the tart cherry production in the United States in 2018 , by state . In Michigan , some 201 million pounds of tart cherries were produced in that year .
